original_text: Then another angel came. He stood at the altar where people offered gifts to God. He had a gold bowl to put incense in. He received a lot of incense and he burned it as a gift to God. It made a nice smell and it mixed with the prayers of God's people. The angel offered the incense and the prayers on the gold altar that was in front of God's throne.
korean_text: 또 다른 천사가 와서 제단 곁에 서서 금 향로를 가지고 많은 향을 받았으니 이는 모든 성도의 기도와 합하여 보좌 앞 금 제단에 드리고자 함이라

sentences.original_text: He stood at the altar where people offered gifts to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들이 하나님께 선물을 바치는 제단에 섰습니다.

sentences.original_text: He had a gold bowl to put incense in.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게는 향을 담을 금 그릇이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He received a lot of incense
and he burned it as a gift to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 하나님께 드리는 선물로서 태웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: and it mixed with the prayers of God's people.
The angel offered the incense and the prayers
on the gold altar that was in front of God's throne.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 옥좌 앞에 있는 금 제단 위에서.
